ModMetaData.name: Gerzee Expansion
ModMetaData.author: Brightsideguy
ModMetaData.description: FOOD ONLY GUTHUB VERSION --- Plant and equipment expansion for the Gerzee Race. Currently includes a plant that can be grown in below-freezing temperatures, a powerful battering ram for those with Gerzee-like strength, a simple Gerzee helmet, and a full Gerzee power armor set. Coming soon: CE patch and additional faction.
